solution_line_template: The {container_capacity_oz}-ounce container can hold {container_capacity_oz}/{ounces_per_cup} = <<{container_capacity_oz}/{ounces_per_cup}={container_capacity_cups}>>{container_capacity_cups} cups of water.

This means that {container_capacity_cups}*{soap_per_cup} = <<{container_capacity_cups}*{soap_per_cup}={total_soap_tablespoons}>>{total_soap_tablespoons} tablespoons of soap should be used, since each cup of water requires {soap_per_cup} tablespoons of soap.
